title: Tata Punch EV, Tiago EV get discounts of up to Rs 85,000 this month
description: Tata Motors is offering attractive discounts and benefits on MY2024 and MY2025 stock of the Punch EV and Tiago EV this month. While the discounts vary depending on the variant, they have been split into two: “Green bonus” and benefits on exchange or scrapping. MY24 Tiago EV gets max discount of Rs 85,000 Max discount on MY24 Punch EV is Rs 70,000 Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Please check with your local dealer for exact figures.  Tata Tiago EV discounts for January 2025 MY2024 stock of the Tata Tiago EV 3.3 kW XE variant, priced at Rs 8.57 lakh, gets Rs 50,000 as discounts. The 3.3kW XT MR that costs Rs 9.61 lakh gets discounts of Rs 70,000, while the Rs 10.63 lakh 3.3 KW XT LR variant gets Rs 85,000 off. The Tiago EV 3.3kW XZ+ priced at Rs 11.18 lakh and the top-spec XZ+ Tech Lux priced at Rs 11.71 lakh get benefits of around Rs 60,000. The Tiago EV XZ+ and XZ+ Tech Lux variants with the 7.2kW fast charger also get Rs 60,000 in discounts. The MY2025 Tiago EV gets Rs 40,000 in benefits across the line-up. Tata Punch EV discounts for January 2025 MY2024 stock of the Smart and Smart + variants of the Tata Punch EV 3.3kW MR are available with discounts of Rs 40,000. All other 3.3kW MR variants get discounts of Rs 50,000. The 3.3kW LR variant gets Rs 50,000 in discounts while the LR with a 7.2kW fast charger gets Rs 70,000 discounts for all variants. For MY2025, all variants of the Tata Punch EV, excluding the Smart and Smart +, get benefits of Rs 40,000. Also read: Tata Punch EV long term, 8,715km report
author: Akbar Merchant
excerpt: Both EVs get higher discounts on unsold MY2024 stock.

html:
Both EVs get higher discounts on unsold MY2024 stock.

Tata Motors is offering attractive discounts and benefits on MY2024 and MY2025 stock of the Punch EV and Tiago EV this month. While the discounts vary depending on the variant, they have been split into two: “Green bonus” and benefits on exchange or scrapping.

  • MY24 Tiago EV gets max discount of Rs 85,000
  • Max discount on MY24 Punch EV is Rs 70,000

Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Please check with your local dealer for exact figures. 

Tata Tiago EV discounts for January 2025

MY2024 stock of the Tata Tiago EV 3.3 kW XE variant, priced at Rs 8.57 lakh, gets Rs 50,000 as discounts. The 3.3kW XT MR that costs Rs 9.61 lakh gets discounts of Rs 70,000, while the Rs 10.63 lakh 3.3 KW XT LR variant gets Rs 85,000 off. The Tiago EV 3.3kW XZ+ priced at Rs 11.18 lakh and the top-spec XZ+ Tech Lux priced at Rs 11.71 lakh get benefits of around Rs 60,000.

The Tiago EV XZ+ and XZ+ Tech Lux variants with the 7.2kW fast charger also get Rs 60,000 in discounts. The MY2025 Tiago EV gets Rs 40,000 in benefits across the line-up.

Tata Punch EV discounts for January 2025

MY2024 stock of the Smart and Smart + variants of the Tata Punch EV 3.3kW MR are available with discounts of Rs 40,000. All other 3.3kW MR variants get discounts of Rs 50,000. The 3.3kW LR variant gets Rs 50,000 in discounts while the LR with a 7.2kW fast charger gets Rs 70,000 discounts for all variants. For MY2025, all variants of the Tata Punch EV, excluding the Smart and Smart +, get benefits of Rs 40,000.
